Name: Forgotten Land
About the game: Forgotten Land is a small adventure game in which you will play for the driver who had an accident. The protagonist finds himself in a large valley, which according to local legend was called the Forgotten Land. There is a legend that the spirit of the ancient creature lives in the valley, which takes souls of all people who have taken the wrong turning. In any case, the main character needs to get out of the valley quickly and to find the nearest village. -Playing time is limited, if the main character does not find the village in time, he will die from the cold and the game will start from the beginning. -There are several ways to get to the village. Each of them will reward you in any other way.
